p: Originally piRNAs were solely thought to be present in germline cells, more recently they have been found in other areas of the body including blood ( Yang et al., 2015), blood plasma ( Freedman et al., 2016) and the brain ( Roy et al., 2017) as well as interacting with diseases in the liver ( Rizzo et al., 2016), cardiovascular system ( Loche and Ozanne, 2016) and brain ( Roy et al., 2017) demonstrating their roles are far-reaching. In neurodegenerative disease there have been recent studies on PD and AD.
